name: A Fire in the Night
description:
As a terrible darkness rolls over the land, one final hope awakens from its slumber in the great depths of the caves.

Race against the oncoming dark, lighting the fiery beacons on your way to the final hearth beneath Morrow's Peak.  Only then shall the land be guarded from the evils of the night.

All assets have been created by us within the jam period, with the exception of:

  • Splash screen / main menu image (image of phoenix)
  • Music
  • Sound effects
  • Fonts
